thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 6 of 147
thread.title: Jeanne Erickson Cooley
thread.title_full: MOO.COM reviewed by Jeanne Erickson Cooley

author: Jeanne Erickson Cooley
title: Jeanne Erickson Cooley
text: I recently received my order of business cards from Moo (the second time I ordered). The order arrived with some alignment issues. I emailed right away, received an email back within hours. Moo reprinted my cards at no extra charge. They arrived within a week of my email. They are absolutely perfect. I couldn't be happier!
